Adding and editing

Add item by filling name, price and type of your item to form below, and predd 'Add item' button. The size of the tag can be set with size-selection. The long size is meant for bookmark-like tags.

Multiple similar items or even whole series can be added by using Suffix-field. For example by setting name to 'Manga' and suffix to '1-3' items named 'Manga 1', 'Manga 2' and 'Manga 3' would be added. Using the same name with suffix 'Blue Red' would add items 'Manga Blue' and 'Manga Red'.

When you have added item, its price tag will appear in the list below form. You can edit item details by typing into the fields in the tag. By using button within the tag you can adjust the size of the tag.

Printing

You can print price tags directly from this view by printing this page. You can do so by pressing 'Print' button. When you have printed the tags, they should be marked as printed by pressing 'Mark all as printed' button. This moves the tags to list at bottom of the page and ensures that they are not printed again if you print more later.

Please don't copy the same tag for multiple items. Every item needs its own unique barcode!

With button you can mark a single tag to or back from printed list. Use this feature if you print tags in multiple batches, or if you print only some tags again.

Removing

If you have added excess or wrong tags, you can delete such tags by pressing button.

Adding new boxes

Add a new box by filling the description, item prefix, the number of items, price and type to the form below. and press 'Add Box' button.

The new box will appear below the form.

Printing

You can print the contents of the box by pressing the 'Print' button. The color of the Print button is switched to gray after printing.

Removing

You can delete existing boxes by pressing the button.
